These earrings are made out of acrylic and stainless steel, they don’t feel particularly luxurious but they do feel well made especially at this price point. They all fit a standard ear piercing (18 gauge) though the screw cap earrings were a tight squeeze and would be more comfortable on a 16 gauge. I would definitely recommend these to anyone trying to add a little punky flair to their outfit without breaking the bank.

评论概述: Amazing Collection Of Earrings For The Price
评论详情: This a huge set of many types of earrings good for both men and women alike.  The earrings are good quality and really cool looking.  Each pair seems to have good attention to detail and solid craftsmanship.  The black coloring seems like it will hold up during ear and not flake off.  I love all the dark, punk/gothic themed ones the best especially the hoops.  Since I have five piercings in each ear I will be able to wear several of the earrings from this set at one time.  Some of the earrings are quite heavy though so if that affects you just take note.  The dice and a few of the thick hoop ones are heavy.  Others in the set are not as heavy - so it’s still worth trying out this set if it looks like some of them will fit your style.  All the earrings come in one small storage box, but I have an organizer that I will use instead because I feel like they will be too tangled up if I try to keep them in the plastic box.  Overall a great set for a great price!
This set have a good variety of earrings. I really like them and they look good on me. It is a good deal.

评论概述: Not as big as I expected but still cute
评论详情: Nice to be able to just put on when I'm going out

So far I have not had a reaction to the metal so far (I react to nickel), so that's a big plus right off the bat. I love the variety of earring types, cuffs, and hoops.  However, some of the hoops are a bit difficult to close and "snap" together, namely the spiked hoops and triangular ones. Aside from that, they're cute and comfortable.
they are nice for men

These stud and dangling earrings are very detailed. The paint appears to be enamel and doesn't feel like it will flake off easily. They're lightweight and won't pull down your earlobes; simple to put on and take off. It's a good bargain for so many in one set.

评论概述: Love them, just can't wear them. Post size is larger than a standard piercing and is not specified.
评论详情: They are a great looking set of earrings and it's killing me I can't wear them. None of the posts fit my ear piercings. Which makes absolutely no sense since I have no issues with any other earrings. And I have tons of earrings and no issues. The product write-up does not specify that these are for a larger than standard ear piercing (or a specific gauge) and yet they do not fit. I'm assuming it's the black finish, no idea. It's frustrating. Back when I was younger and having health issues, I had to let my cartilage piercings close, so I want to have them re-pierced. When I do that, I'll be discussing with the piercer about minor stretching of my other piercings so that maybe I can actually wear these.  It's a real shame as otherwise they seem to be made very well (super sturdy) and the designs are so much fun!  The post size is an issue... I'm deducting stars. Should be specified what the post size is so that people know if they can wear them or not.

I absolutely love that all of these hooped earrings actually have a hinge that folds open in the middle. It makes the earring SO EASY to put on and take off! The designs are cool and the black finish is what I would expect. For the price, I think you get a really good value!

I love them all. They all arrived nicely packed individually in their own little bag in a plastic box. I liked that. They fit nicely too you do need to be careful with some because you can accidentally drop a cross when putting these on for example. That doesn't bother me. I just need to be careful. Other then that I love em all.

This is a great set of unusual earrings, mostly of a rougher style.  Hatchets, knives, cuffs, crosses.  All in black.  They take me back to the 80's when punk was young and this kind of thing was shocking.  Not so much shocking anymore but still fun.The earrings themselves are pretty good.  A couple pair are pretty small, those are harder to put on.  Most of them are regular size though.  Show the kids what cool is.
They're all nice, but I feel like they weren't made that well. They snap in but have still fallen out. I'd still consider them a great buy
